summary: Bonding with the Avengers: Featuring Pepper Potts
title: Bonding with the Avengers: Featuring Pepper Potts
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2ZpbBMa

by SupernaturalWhoLocked

Pepper Potts has to deal with the Avengers but she’s also good friends with them. This is just a story where she bonds with either one or multiple Avengers at a time in a sometimes angst and emotional filled way. Some chapters will be compliant with Endgame others will not because Endgame was an emotional rollercoaster. Lots of Pepperony.

blog.name: youngmoneymilla
blog.title: Clouds of Ink
blog.description: 28 | 18+ Blog | Mobile Master List | Buy Me a Ko-Fi | Freaky Fridays

summary: Please,, at your earliest convenience,,, write some happy Tony,,, whether it’s at the expense of y/n’s as a dark fic, I don’t...
question: Please,, at your earliest convenience,,, write some happy Tony,,, whether it’s at the expense of y/n’s as a dark fic, I don’t Mind ,,, I just want to see him happy - he deserves that much 😭 (your most recent young!tony made me cRY a real tear, I luv u + thank you for all that you do
answer:
a/n: lol okay this is stupid and silly and not angsty

“So..” Sam wiggles his eyebrows as he stares down at Tony’s upturned face. “What’s it feel like?”

Tony exhales deeply, his stomach turning with each twist of his body. The pillow on his lap doing nothing to alleviate the ungodly pressure in his crotch.

“Like I’m literally being torn in half and I’m this close to fucking the nearest hole,” he snaps.

Sam’s eyes widen and he steps backwards. Banner checks Tony’s temperature again and frowns.

“You’re in the thick of it,” he notes without the least bit of sympathy.

“Oh,” Tony groans. “I can fucking tell.”

Behind a closed door, he hears your muffled whine. His body jerks – calling to you, desperate for you.

“Jesus,” he says. “Is she in there alone?”

“Nah,” Sam tells him. “She’s got Bucky, Steve and Nat.”

“That’s so much worse,” he groans as he presses the flat of his palm to his forehead.

He had been in the lab with you and he had unknowingly released some sort of pheromone gas that made you crave the other infected person. It was essentially a “lust potion”.

You really couldn’t make this shit up.

Steve had taken matters into his own hands and quickly separated the two of you. Tony had thought it better to just fuck it out and you had seemed on board until Steve had bodily wrapped his arms around your waist and carried you to a sealed off location.

Bastard.

Tony hears a commotion and before he can blink, a body crashes straight into his. You’re straddling his waist, your hair in his eyes.  The smell of you touches something deep inside him, curls like a tight fist and tears its way through his chest. It is perfect.

You lean forward and kiss him with wet lips. It’s spit slick and messy and he crushes your skull to his own as they ferociously go at it in front of the whole team.

He can hear Steve swear profusely in the corner before trying to yank you off him. 

“Fuck off, Rogers,” you grunt as you kick his shin. “I want him. I want, Tony.”

“You’re poisoned!”

“No,” you practically scream. “No. No. I want him.”

Tony could give two shits. He makes grabby hands at you and you effectively stomp on Steve’s foot so, that you can run to his lap again.

Natasha is filming everything on her phone.

“Give it a break, Steve,” she calls to him. “Let them be.”

He whirls around on her. “How can you be okay with this? Neither of them can properly consent!”

“Speak for yourself, Capsicle,” Tony grumbles as he licks patterns into the hollow of your throat.

“What he said,” you reply, fisting your hand into his hair to press him closer.

“Steve,” Nat grins. “They’ve been secretly hooking up for a year. This isn’t a new thing.”

Steve’s eyebrows hit the top of his head. He looks like a drunk fish.

“What?”

“Oh yeah,” Tony says in between kissing you. “Both of us signed contracts when we got together. There was probably something in there about issues surrounding sex pollen pheromones.”

Your head falls backwards and your bruised lips part. “Don’t worry, Steve. We were literally mid fuck when he pierced the gas canister – “

“Yep,” Tony agrees. “I had my head between – “

“You know what?” Steve pinches the bridge of his nose. “I don’t even want to know.”

Tony could give two shits. He makes grabby hands at you and you effectively stomp on Steve’s foot so, that you can run to his lap again.

Natasha is filming everything on her phone.

“Give it a break, Steve,” she calls to him. “Let them be.”

He whirls around on her. “How can you be okay with this? Neither of them can properly consent!”

“Speak for yourself, Capsicle,” Tony grumbles as he licks patterns into the hollow of your throat.

“What he said,” you reply, fisting your hand into his hair to press him closer.

“Steve,” Nat grins. “They’ve been secretly hooking up for a year. This isn’t a new thing.”

Steve’s eyebrows hit the top of his head. He looks like a drunk fish.

“What?”

“Oh yeah,” Tony says in between kissing you. “Both of us signed contracts when we got together. There was probably something in there about issues surrounding sex pollen pheromones.”

Your head falls backwards and your bruised lips part. “Don’t worry, Steve. We were literally mid fuck when he pierced the gas canister – “

“Yep,” Tony agrees. “I had my head between – “

“You know what?” Steve pinches the bridge of his nose. “I don’t even want to know.”

summary: Sometimes Spider-healing Just Isn't Fast Enough
title: Sometimes Spider-healing Just Isn't Fast Enough
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2ZsloRD

by Cheshire_XOXO

Or — It’s been nine months since Peter broke up with his first love, first real relationship, and he’s frustrated that he hasn’t fully recovered from it since clearly his ex already has.

—

His parents, Aunt May and Uncle Ben, Tony and Pepper… Peter knew what love looked like—what love was supposed to look like. When you love someone, you couldn’t just one day decide that you didn’t love them anymore… right? Love wasn’t supposed to stop, love wasn’t supposed to end. So why did it?

The ending of Peter’s first serious relationship has left him with some pretty deep scars and serious damage to his self-worth. Luckily, he’s got some pretty great friends and family to remind him of how much he is loved.

summary: headcanon of tony stark x penny parker married life.
question: headcanon of tony stark x penny parker married life.
answer:
They would absolutely be the cutest couple in the whole world! He would spoil her with endless amounts of jewelry, purses, dresses; the most expensive make up out there. Books and comic books, legos, posters. If she even thought about it, Tony already has it in the cart.

She would be spider-woman and have a full time career, so obviously, Tony would be the one cooking. (He suck. Thank god he can afford to have a full time chef.)

He would buy her a house in every city he has to be a lot, so she can stay st home when he travels. Of course, when the baby comes, he would retire and pass everything onto his CEO Pepper.

Then he would build Penny her dream house, in her dream location. Away from public eye. No one even knows who lives in that house other than the people living there.

Penny would also be the cutest little pregnant lady ever. Her tummy would be so big and her body so small, she would have to start waddling at like 4 months.

And even when Penny is bitchy and crying because growing a human inside yourself sucks, Tony would just have utter heart eyes the entire time. Waiting on her hand and foot, getting her everything she could ever want, no matter how weird.

“Oh, you want that chocolate from Germany I brought home six years ago? Hold on, lemme get in the jet, be back in 12 hours.”

And then the baby would come and Tony would never let her down. Like ever. She was either in Penny’s arms or his.

Ah, they would be so cute, bless

summary: “If they are sleeping here, some of them are gonna have to double up.”
body:
“If they are sleeping here, some of them are gonna have to double up.”

Part 1 of 2. 

Teen and up.

I’ll post it on AO3 too, as soon as I finish it - user h_Magnus if you are interested :3 

I just couldn’t wait to share :3

_________________________

“Okay, here are the pillows… blankets…” Clint tosses the bed sheets on the couch that has been converted into a bed. “Make yourselves at home.”

“Yourselves?” Tony raises an eyebrow.

Barton scratches his head, looking a bit guilty. “Yeah, you see… We don’t have enough room for so many people. Nat and Banner are going to share the bedroom upstairs, and, ah- so you’re sharing the couch.”

“It’s… okay, Clint,” Steve stammers after an awkward silence. Tony thinks he can sense the effort Cap makes to force his voice sound all polite and indifferent. “Thank you. For everything.”

Stark looks up at the soldier, meeting his eyes for a second.

“Don’t take over my half,” he blurts dismissively as he turns his back at his teammate. He picks up the towel Barton brought along with the bed sheets and gives Clint a small smile. “The bathroom’s upstairs?”

* * *

Without giving any thought to what his hands are doing, Steve unfolds the bed sheet and carefully spreads it out on the coach, as he is trying to give himself a mental pep talk. “Come on, what’s so terrible about it? Clint has a great house. A great sofa, too. Better than many places you had to spend nights at, soldier. And Tony. I’ll be sleeping with Tony, so what. Sleeping with Tony.”

Steve shuts his eyes tight, letting a quiet groan out. He tosses the pillow that he’s just wrapped into a case on the sofa and reaches for the jug of water on the coffee table. Wait, maybe he could sleep on the lawn? Rogers fills the nearest glass with water and drinks it at a draught. Restless, he takes the glass to the kitchen and washes it along with the dishes left after dinner. He wipes the table clean, arranges the chairs and places the darts Tony and Clint forgot to put away into the box. He can’t think of anything else to do, so he hesitates, opens the door to return into the room and bumps into Tony in the hall.

Steve can’t help glancing at him, taking the sight in. Back at the Tower, Stark’s home clothing normally consisted of track pants and tank tops, all fitting perfectly. Now, he’s wearing Clint’s T-shirt and pajama pants, both items slightly, but visibly larger than him. God, has he always been this short? He would probably drown in Steve’s clothes…

The soldier’s imagination is quick to picture his teammate in one of his own shirts and Rogers abruptly exhales, hurriedly turning away and trying not to speculate on the possible circumstances of Tony putting on any of his clothes. He should at least make it to the shower first.  

“I think I’ve used all the hot water,” Tony informs him, pushing the door into the room.

“It’s okay. I’d better- I mean, cold water is fine.”

* * *

Tony collapses on the couch covered with neatly spread bed sheets and closes his eyes. Could the timing be any worse? He is so not ready for all this right now. OK, he needs a plan. Gladly, he’s exhausted enough, maybe he can just flack out before… The steps in the hall ruin it all. Rogers and his damn soldier habits.    

Cap enters the room, his eyes immediately darting at Tony splayed across the couch. He clears his throat and reaches for the light switch. “You need anything, or…?”

Tony props himself up on his elbows.

“Why, is it bedtime already?” he asks, fake disappointment in his voice. “No pillow fighting? Spin the bottle?”

“Another time,” Steve grumbles before turning the lights off.

Tony snorts, climbing up the sofa and getting between the sheets. So here it goes.

Steve walks to the couch carefully, trying not to step on anything on his way. Hesitating a second, he lies down on the very edge, his head at the footboard. However, the next moment his legs bump against the back of the couch and he realizes the sofa is too short for him to stretch them out.

“Crap…” he growls semi-coherently.  

“What did you just say?”

Rogers gives a heavy sigh. “How long are you going to bring this up?”

“Till death do us apart,” Tony promises with a grin, and for some reason, Steve believes him. “So… what’s the bad word about?”

“Nothing. It just looks like I don’t fit into Clint’s sofa.”

Tony rolls his eyes. “Well, you could’ve also put a sword between us or something,” he taps the couch by his side. “Relax, Cap, I don’t intend to deprive you of virginity.”

Though he can’t give any promises.

Steve, who’s already picked up his pillow to change the side, goes still. Tony rises upward, staring at him in disbelief.  

“What, seriously? You’re a vir-”

Steve’s pillow smacks into his face.

“Goodnight, Tony,” he snaps climbing up the coach to change the side.

Stark can’t just let go such a perfect opportunity to strike back. He tries to slam the pillow into Steve’s face, but the soldier blocks the attack effortlessly and takes the down-filled weapon away. “For Heaven’s sake, just sleep,” he begs, but Tony can hear his voice go softer.

When Cap nestles down by his side, Tony feels his own heartbeat go out of control. For a few seconds, they both just lie like this, breathing heavily and confusedly staring at each other. Steve is the first to lose it. With one more awkward “goodnight, Tony,” he turns his back at him and pulls to the edge of the couch.  

______

There we go :3 I’m not a native speaker, so if you see any gross mistakes feel free to tell me, I’ll only be grateful). 

Hope you enjoyed it anyway :3

The soldier’s imagination is quick to picture his teammate in one of his own shirts and Rogers abruptly exhales, hurriedly turning away and trying not to speculate on the possible circumstances of Tony putting on any of his clothes. He should at least make it to the shower first.  

“I think I’ve used all the hot water,” Tony informs him, pushing the door into the room.

“It’s okay. I’d better- I mean, cold water is fine.”

* * *

Tony collapses on the couch covered with neatly spread bed sheets and closes his eyes. Could the timing be any worse? He is so not ready for all this right now. OK, he needs a plan. Gladly, he’s exhausted enough, maybe he can just flack out before… The steps in the hall ruin it all. Rogers and his damn soldier habits.    

Cap enters the room, his eyes immediately darting at Tony splayed across the couch. He clears his throat and reaches for the light switch. “You need anything, or…?”

Tony props himself up on his elbows.

“Why, is it bedtime already?” he asks, fake disappointment in his voice. “No pillow fighting? Spin the bottle?”

“Another time,” Steve grumbles before turning the lights off.

Tony snorts, climbing up the sofa and getting between the sheets. So here it goes.

Steve walks to the couch carefully, trying not to step on anything on his way. Hesitating a second, he lies down on the very edge, his head at the footboard. However, the next moment his legs bump against the back of the couch and he realizes the sofa is too short for him to stretch them out.

“Crap…” he growls semi-coherently.  

“What did you just say?”

Rogers gives a heavy sigh. “How long are you going to bring this up?”

“Till death do us apart,” Tony promises with a grin, and for some reason, Steve believes him. “So… what’s the bad word about?”

“Nothing. It just looks like I don’t fit into Clint’s sofa.”

Tony rolls his eyes. “Well, you could’ve also put a sword between us or something,” he taps the couch by his side. “Relax, Cap, I don’t intend to deprive you of virginity.”

Though he can’t give any promises.

Steve, who’s already picked up his pillow to change the side, goes still. Tony rises upward, staring at him in disbelief.  

“What, seriously? You’re a vir-”

Steve’s pillow smacks into his face.

“Goodnight, Tony,” he snaps climbing up the coach to change the side.

Stark can’t just let go such a perfect opportunity to strike back. He tries to slam the pillow into Steve’s face, but the soldier blocks the attack effortlessly and takes the down-filled weapon away. “For Heaven’s sake, just sleep,” he begs, but Tony can hear his voice go softer.

When Cap nestles down by his side, Tony feels his own heartbeat go out of control. For a few seconds, they both just lie like this, breathing heavily and confusedly staring at each other. Steve is the first to lose it. With one more awkward “goodnight, Tony,” he turns his back at him and pulls to the edge of the couch.  

______

There we go :3 I’m not a native speaker, so if you see any gross mistakes feel free to tell me, I’ll only be grateful). 

Hope you enjoyed it anyway :3

“It’s… okay, Clint,” Steve stammers after an awkward silence. Tony thinks he can sense the effort Cap makes to force his voice sound all polite and indifferent. “Thank you. For everything.”

Stark looks up at the soldier, meeting his eyes for a second.

“Don’t take over my half,” he blurts dismissively as he turns his back at his teammate. He picks up the towel Barton brought along with the bed sheets and gives Clint a small smile. “The bathroom’s upstairs?”

body:
Diaries of a Serial Killer.

Diaries of a Serial Killer.

Chapter 3

Sometime 1999

I hate feeling the way i do, i hate this unbearable guilt inside of me for the things that i’ve done. I hate knowing that someone out there is searching for the boys i let dissapear. The feeling of a crying family who try so hard to hold onto that hope that their boy is still alive, which hes not, i felt his light fade away right in my own two hands. When did i become this ? Why do i keep hurting people that i actually wanna be with???

I hate myself so much that i force myself to be confident at all times, that is the reason why i always appear like a major jerk to everyone. Because if i dont pretend..even for a second someone could see the real me, could lurk behind this strong mask of mine and reveal the broken psychopathic killer that i am. I want to stop i want to focus on good things i need to do good things for a Balance, for change.

Is there a study that Psychopaths are even able to cry? Or am i just tripping again ?. What is this nightmare that i can’t escape out of, why do i need this to function ? And why is nobody asking question ? Nobody is suspecting me and im just slowly losing my mind.

I need to quit doing coke at 3am.

Anthony Edward “Tony” Stark .

After Tony hit Peter over the head with a heavy book he dragged him into the elevator and took him into the basement. Its quiet down there, the walls are thick and only Tony has Access to it which makes it the Perfect spot. He lays the boy down onto a matress and cuffs his hand to the stone wall, its a special Kind of material he wont be able to break out of that.

Tony then sits down outside of the huge Metall cage on a chair, feeling some tears behind his eyes again. For so long he was able to stop, he did good he helped people to get his so deeply needed Balance back, and here he is, having a full on relapse. For so long he was able to resist. To fight this dark urge inside of him and all it took was Peter asking in that weak voice of his if Tony is going to kill him to send him over that edge again.

So he lets a tear slip out, wiping it away just as quickly and leaning back, head against the wall and waiting for Peter to wake up. Meanwhile he pulls out a small list of his rules that Peter is going to need if he wants to survive this, because this time Tony isnt going to have fun and then kill him.

Hes going to try to convert the boy, to bring him onto his dark path to Twist and turn him, someone needs to carry on Tonys legacy afterall.

Its going to be a Lot of work tho he already knows it.

Just After that Peter jumps awake, standing up and turning to look at Tony. “What did you do? Why…why did you..ouch” Peter frowns, moving his other hand to gently stroke over the bump on his head. Thats when he remembers what he read what he found out about Tony, and it sends a dark shiver down his spine when he looks around.

His expression changing .

“I… I thought you liked me Mr. Stark i thought we were something like friends. Please don’t do this we can talk about everything you know i listen! Just Please…let me…go” And then his voice cracks he starts crying, not heavily just a bit, he tries to keep it down he dosent want to upset the Killer infront of him afterall. “I thought…. Nevermind.” Peter says.

When Tony sees that boys eyes tearing up he feels that guilt in his chest again, staring back at him. The last sentence spiked his interest. “You thought what ? Come on, Peter just spit it out i have work to do and all that i can’t sit around here and Listen to..-” thats when hes being cut off by Peter .

“I thought…I really thought you were crushing on me too…” he frowns deeply. Despite their situation and all, but this hurt him deeply. He really thought Tony liked him ‘in that way’ and now hes here, in a cage, being chained to a wall. “Just don’t go… please don’t leave me alone down here i am..im.. kinda scared of the dark” Peter admits, a tear Rolling down his cheek.

And Tony, well Tony feels his guilt get heavier with every word.

What has he done?

to be continued…

( tag list: @lovehonestlyvaliantbouquetus )
